items.content_html: Chainadres is a lightweight and secure wallet sender app designed for sending transactions on blockchain networks. This application simplifies the process of initiating transactions by providing an intuitive interface to interact with blockchain wallets.

items.content_html: Lightweight library inspired by the Flutter framework (html.js), the Angular framework (renderer.js, css.js) and the JQuery Library (utils.js, prototype.js) which includes a set of utilities and prototypes to prevent losses of production time and to help the developers write fewer lines of code.
